channelDescription:
I'm dedicated to sharing a '#peace' of my life with you!  Through the use of #meditation, guided visualization, inspiring talks and relaxation music,  you're about to open yourself to changes of immense harmony for your body, mind and spirit.

Check out the links below for all of our social media platforms and don't forget to grab your FREE sleep meditation!

Weekly Program: 

NEW VIDEOS RELEASE EVERY WEEK!

Occasionally, especially when travelling, I will do extra videos.



IMPORTANT:

Please Note: My meditations, affirmations and talks are never to take the place of professional medical advice - and never listen whilst driving or operating machinery of any kind. 

 #guidedmeditation #meditations #bestmeditations #jasonstephenson #sleepmediations #sleepmusic

This and other videos of yours have gotten me through the hardest time of my life... After loosing my 8 year old son I was on medications to help with anxiety and to help sleep... Yet they didn't help me .... Your videos did . Thank you from my mind body and soul and of course my heart 💖💙
I don't know why, but instead of sleeping, this video just made me cry and sob for 30 mins.  I have been suffer by from anxiety and depression for 15 weeks.  Maybe this helped me release something?

If you are reading this, may you experience peace in your life 🧘‍♂️  Manifest as you read this comment, that you will find an abundance of peace, that your soul will be at rest in this life, and the afterlife. You are worthy of all that will come to you. Create the vibration and attract the energy. Have a blessed day 🙏✨️
This is my favorite meditation, 3 years on still has the same powerful effect. Now my 6 year old asks me to put the “meditation man” on every night before sleep. Thank you 🙏🏼🙏🏼
